entry.title: Sait 50368 - W222 1 X 2 X 1/4 A80Gfx Cfmp
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sait
Type: W Shapes for Stock Removal
Price: 21.29

[shortdesc]
  • Latex Bond - finer grit for ultimate finishing
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Sait
    Application Blending, Finishing
    Diameter 1 Inch
    Grit 80
    Width 2 Inch
    Product Type W Shapes for Stock Removal
    RPM 15900
    Shank 1/4 Inch

    Technical Specifications

    Multiple layers of cotton impregnated with abrasive grain and special bonding agents allow for the coolest blending and finishing mounted points
    Special cotton formula will never load on soft non-ferrous metals like aluminum
    Available in two bonding age

    Extra Product Information

  • Latex Bond - finer grit for ultimate finishing For use on: Aluminum, Metal, Stainless

    • Product Information

  • A54MTX: Resin Bond for light removal/blending
  • A80GFX: Latex Bond with finer grit for ultimate finishing
  • Mandrel overhang InchO Inch must always be the lowest possible
  • Maximum speeds given refer to overhang InchO Inch equal to 1/2 Inch.

    • Suggested Application

  • For use on: Aluminum, Metal, Stainless
    		•

entry.title: Norton 23000 - Vitrified Bond Mounted Points A Shapes 32A36-Tvbem 1X2-3/4 N4 1/4X1-1/2 61463623000
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norton
Type: A-shape Mounted Points
Price: 8.70

[shortdesc]
  • A mounted wheel is a small grinding wheel permanently fastened to its own spindle
  • They are used is a multitude of operations in almost every industry and on a variety of machines
  • Extensively used in tool and die shops, aerospace and foundries for removing parting lines, deburring, and finishing
  • Mounted wheels come in an extensive numbers of shapes, grit sizes and bond types to satisfy all of these applications.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Norton
    Grit 36
    Product Type A-shape Mounted Points

    Product Information

  • Sharp versatile aluminum oxide grain
  • Free cutting on a wide variety of materials
  • Sharp monocrystalline grain resists burn
  • Better choice, with excellent form-holding compared to more friable white aluminum oxides
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB64802 - Scotch-Brite Exl Unitized Mounted Point, B52 x 1/8 in 8S Fin, Sb64802 7100068025
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 5.74

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite EXL Unitized Mounted Point, B52 x 1/8 in 8S FIN, 5 per inner 50 per case

  • Our Scotch-Brite EXL Unitized Mounted Point lightly deburrs, blends and finishes metal and plastic parts
  • The versatile assortment of shapes and sizes make the EXL Unitized Mounted Point a good match for small parts with hard-to-reach areas.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Mounted point is securely fastened to a metal spindle for safe use with die grinder
  • Abrasive lightly deburrs and finishes the workpiece without changing geometry
  • Resists smearing for cleaner surfaces and less preparation
  • Nonwoven construction resists loading during product use
  • Unitized production method compresses abrasive web for greater density and durability
    		•

entry.title: Norton 22664 - Bf3 Cotton Fiber Mounted Points A80-Hbf3 A11 N4 1/4X1-1/2 61463622664
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norton
Type: A-shape Mounted Points
Price: 24.95

[shortdesc]
  • A mounted wheel is a small grinding wheel permanently fastened to its own spindle
  • They are used is a multitude of operations in almost every industry and on a variety of machines
  • Extensively used in tool and die shops, aerospace and foundries for removing parting lines, deburring, and finishing
  • Mounted wheels come in an extensive numbers of shapes, grit sizes and bond types to satisfy all of these applications.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Norton
    Grit 80
    Product Type A-shape Mounted Points

    Product Information

  • Aluminum oxide grain provides an excellent blend of cut rate and life
  • The cotton fibers ensure smooth, chatter-free grinding
  • Non-loading on soft materials like aluminum, brass, and bronze
  • Designed for blending and polishing in one step
  • use 80 grit for most materials and 120 for polishing and stainless steel applications
    		•
